SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Design, customize, and bring your Spectacles to life
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's bring your unique eyewear ideas to life. Fill out the form below to start your Spectacles journey.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Design, customize, and order your perfect pair of Spectacles with our intuitive app
FEATURE_1_BODY: Create custom Spectacles with our intuitive design interface. Choose frames, lenses, and unique features to match your style.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Experience cutting-edge smart lenses that adapt to your environment, offering optimal vision in any lighting condition.
FEATURE_3_BODY: See how your Spectacles look before you buy with our advanced AR technology. Perfect your style from the comfort of your home.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Each pair of Spectacles is meticulously crafted to ensure superior quality, comfort, and durability for everyday wear.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Connect your Spectacles to your smart devices for hands-free notifications, audio playback, and voice assistant access.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Experience unparalleled comfort with our custom-fit technology, ensuring your Spectacles feel like they were made just for you.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about creating your own Spectacles
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Spectacles are custom-made eyewear that you can design and create using our app. They're personalized glasses tailored to your style and preferences.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Our app guides you through the process of designing your Spectacles. You can choose frame styles, colors, lens types, and add custom features. Once designed, we manufacture and deliver your unique eyewear.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I try on the Spectacles virtually before ordering?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes! Our app features an augmented reality (AR) try-on feature. You can see how different designs look on your face before finalizing your order.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How long does it take to receive my custom Spectacles?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Typically, it takes 2-3 weeks from the time you place your order to delivery. This includes manufacturing time and shipping.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: What if I'm not satisfied with my Spectacles?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: We offer a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your Spectacles, you can return them for a full refund or work with our team to adjust the design.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Spectacles Making
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What materials do I need to make Spectacles?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: To make Spectacles, you'll need frame materials (such as acetate, metal, or plastic), lenses, screws, hinges, and specialized tools. Our app provides a comprehensive list of materials and where to source them.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I customize the design of my Spectacles?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Absolutely! Our app offers a variety of customization options, including frame shapes, colors, and lens types. You can create unique designs or follow our step-by-step guides for classic styles.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do I need prior experience to make Spectacles?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: No prior experience is necessary. Our app is designed for beginners and experts alike, with detailed tutorials, video guides, and tips to help you create professional-quality Spectacles from scratch.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How long does it take to make a pair of Spectacles?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: The time required varies depending on the complexity of the design and your skill level. Typically, a beginner might spend 3-5 hours on their first pair, while experienced makers can complete a pair in 1-2 hours. Our app helps you track your progress and improve your efficiency.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: High-quality acetate frame in various styles
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Prescription or non-prescription lenses with coatings
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Comfortable silicone nose pads for secure fit
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_4: Durable plastic tips for comfort behind ears
